name: VIMEO 2020 | Simple & Elegant Black
description:
?  [THE BEST VIMEO STYLE]
ALL IN ONE - Elegant UI + Nightmode + New Font + No Clutter

----------------------------------

?  [RATE THIS STYLE]
https://forum.userstyles.org/post/discussion?Discussion/StyleID=126304

----------------------------------

?️‍?️  [SEE MY STYLES]
https://userstyles.org/users/292662

----------------------------------

?  [ABOUT]
I create simple, beautiful and useful styles.
I also resurrect old styles that doesn't get updated over here.
Tweet me if you want a style to be: created, fixed or renewed.

----------------------------------

❗  [IMPORTANT]
Do not comment for requests, bugs or fixes in the comment section;
this site doesn't sent notifications for comments/ratings.
Use twitter instead.

----------------------------------
obsoletion_message:
IT WORKS BUT IT HAS
LEGAL ISSUES
:p
additional_info:
? [2020/03/15]
Fixed some inverse filter in other sites.

? [2020/02/27]
Remade the whole style

? [2018/07/16]
More black & new colors

? [2018/07/13] (#2)
Fixed some player errors, thumbnail visuals on homepage, white spots in inputs, changed some colors.


? [2018/07/13]
I fixed all the mess i had with this style. I just made it from ground zero. 
Now, everything is all right. So.. is a comeback of the vimeo´s best style.


? [2016/04/29]
Adds more code for new vimeo features 

? [2016/04/29]
I edit the code because looks like copyright are strong.

Deletes the faded Areas. --> ( http://imgur.com/a/4rnoQ )

? [2016/04/03]
Release, supports vimeo last version.
